statements: DELETE FROM SoloTravelDestinations WHERE user_rating > 4.5 AND travel_preferences = 'Adventure';
DELETE FROM SoloTravelDestinations WHERE user_reviews < 100 OR user_rating < 3.0;
DELETE FROM destination_reviews WHERE rating < 3.0 AND date_posted < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM destination_reviews WHERE destination = 'Paris' AND user_id = 2001 AND rating >= 4.5;
DELETE FROM reviews WHERE review_id = 1 AND destination_id = 100;
DELETE FROM preferences WHERE user_id = 10 AND destination_id = 50;
DELETE FROM users WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM users WHERE age > 30 and gender = 'Male';
